programme.title: Crnicas da Tribo Fantasma, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: Quando fsseis gigantes so descobertos perto da Monglia, uma expedio organizada para analis-los. Quando uma exploso deixa os membros da equipe de escavao enterrados no subsolo, eles descobrem um templo ciclpico e bestas gigantes antigas.

programme.title: Misso Quase Impossvel, (2010, Late Night Comedies)
programme.desc: Ex-C.I.A. espio Bob Ho assume sua tarefa mais difcil at hoje: cuidar dos trs filhos de sua namorada, que no gostaram muito do namorado de sua me.

programme.title: Em Busca do Castelo Dourado, (2019, Children)
programme.desc: Quando o rei e a rainha so envenenados, os irmos Per e Pal so presos suspeitos do crime. O caula da famlia, Espen Ash Lad e a princesa Kristin embarcam em uma perigosa jornada em busca do lendrio castelo Soria Moria e da fonte da gua da Vida

programme.title: Guardies do Tempo, (2020, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Uma menina tenta salvar seus pais adotivos, opondo-se s foras do mal no outro mundo de So Petersburgo.

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin: Cavaleiros de Camelot, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: Um Rei Arthur muito mais velho retorna para casa aps lutar contra o Imprio Romano. Seu filho ilegtimo corrompeu o trono de Camelot. Agora o Rei Arthur deve se reunir com o mago Merlin e os Cavaleiros da Tvola Redonda e lutar para recuperar sua coroa.

programme.title: Imprio Proibido, (2015, Adventure)
programme.desc: No incio do sculo 18, o cartgrafo Jonathan Green empreende uma viagem cientfica da Europa para o Oriente. Passando pela Transilvnia e cruzando as montanhas dos Crpatos, ele encontra uma pequena vila perdida na floresta.

programme.title: O Rei Da Montanha, (2022, Foreign Drama)
programme.desc: Nesta aventura da mitologia nrdica, Espen 'Ash Lad' embarca, junto a seus irmos, em uma perigosa misso para resgatar a princesa de um vilo conhecido como o Rei da Montanha com o intuito de ganhar a recompensa e salvar sua famlia da runa.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo, (2016, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notrio criminoso chins.

programme.title: O Fantasma, (1996, Adventure)
programme.desc: A histria comea como uma expedio ilha de Bengalla, buscando as Caveiras de Touganda. Devido sua enorme energia, elas podem ser desastrosas para a raa humana. Agora, o mal encontrou rival altura e a aventura ganhou um nome: Fantasma!

programme.title: O Monge Prova de Balas, (2020, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma histria em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a histria de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: O Matador - Misso Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele est cuidando sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Batalha dos Imprios, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legio de mil soldados no pas e com o comandante do protetorado das Regies Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: Drages para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as guas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.

programme.title: Combate, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Um jovem lutador deve decidir seu destino; desistir de tudo e treinar para honra e glria ou sucumbir vida de um lutador de jaula por um mafioso russo.

programme.title: O Drago Invencvel, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Um agente da polcia paisana procura vingana contra um sindicato do crime implacvel aps o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: Massacre no Bairro Chins, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie Chan faz o papel de um fugitivo do Japo que se torna um assassino para a mfia. O longa focado na vida de imigrantes chineses que vivem no Japo.

programme.title: Samurai X - O Inferno De Kyoto, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Kenshin Himura vai contra o puro mal Makoto Shishio que est tentando derrubar o governo Meiji. O destino do pas est em jogo quando Kenshin Himura pega a espada que ele jurou nunca mais sacar.

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemtico disfarado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacvel. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se v lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua famlia.

programme.title: Fear Strikes Out, (1957, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: True story of the life of Jimmy Piersall, who battled mental illness to achieve stardom in major league baseball.

programme.title: The Bells Of St Mary's, (1945, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: At a big city Catholic school, Father O'Malley and Sister Benedict indulge in friendly rivalry, and succeed in extending the school through the gift of a building.

programme.title: Birdman of Alcatraz, (1962, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Burt Lancaster stars in the true story of killer Robert Stroud, who spent 43 years in solitary confinement at Alcatraz, and who educated himself, becoming a world renowned authority on birds. Thelma Ritter, Telly Savalas and Karl Malden co-star.

programme.title: Sorry, Wrong Number, (1948, Thriller)
programme.desc: Leona is confined to her bed. One night, whilst waiting for he husband to return home, she picks up the phone and accidentally overhears a conversation between two men planning a murder.

programme.title: The Best Years of Our Lives, (1946, War)
programme.desc: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

programme.title: The Fighting Seabees, (1944, War)
programme.desc: The construction foreman of a fighting work battalion to be stationed near Japanese lines in the Pacific and a naval commander colleague compete in Washington for a journalist, while preparing to engage the enemy in a massive assault.

programme.title: Flying Tigers, (1942, War)
programme.desc: John Wayne adds luster to this early WWII film about the famous P-40 Flying Group who soared into battle against the Japanese in defense of China's freedom, Great dogfight scenes!

programme.title: In Harm's Way, (1965, War)
programme.desc: Producer-director Otto Premingers epic treatment of the bombing of Pearl Harbor details the devastating attack on the Hawaiian naval base as well as the explosive, behind-the-scenes stories.

programme.title: Reindeer Games, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Just one week before Christmas, after serving six years in jail, an ex-con is forced to take part in a deadly casino heist. Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron, and Gary Sinise star in this action-packed crime thriller from director John Frankenheimer.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers, (2002, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: In 1965, America is at war with North Vietnam and Lt. Col. Hal Moore prepares his troops for one of the most violent battles in U.S. History: The Valley of Death.

programme.title: Vantage Point, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: During an historic counter-terrorism summit in Spain, the President of the United States is struck down by an assassin's bullet. Eight strangers have a perfect view of the kill, but what did they really see? Rated: PG-13

programme.title: The Kill Room, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

programme.title: Red State, (2011, Cult Horror)

programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's epic film set in mid-19th century Lower Manhattan tells the story of a young Irish immigrant (Leonardo DiCaprio) seeking revenge against the rival gang leader who killed his father.

programme.desc: Mitch joins a prosperous Memphis firm that affords Mitch and his wife an affluent lifestyle beyond their wildest dreams. But when FBI agents confront him with evidence of corruption and murder within the firm, Mitch sets out to find the truth.

programme.title: Juice, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Q. Raheem. Bishop. Steel. They're four Harlem friends who spend their days hanging out and looking for a way to get the power and respect they call Juice. Q hopes to earn respect by becoming a scratch 'n' mix DJ.

programme.title: The Gentlemen, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: A British drug lord tries to sell off his highly profitable empire to a dynasty of Oklahoma billionaires.

programme.title: Room 237, (2012, Documentary)
programme.desc: Stanley Kubrick's classic film, 'The Shining,' gets a riveting and in-depth exploration of its hidden meanings, dazzling puzzles, and even conspiracy theories.

programme.title: The Wedding Banquet, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: A Chinese Yuppie living in New York who decides that a marriage of convenience is the perfect way to prevent his parents back in Taiwan from discovering he is gay. But his plan backfires when his parents insist on coming to New York for the wedding.

programme.title: Passengers, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: While helping a handful of plane crash survivors cope with their grief, young psychologist Claire Summers (2008 Best Actress, Oscar nominee Anne Hathaway, Rachel Getting Married) begins to uncover conflicting accounts of the accident. rated -PG-13

programme.title: The Fisher King, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: Parry, a homeless history professor, lives in a fantasy world full of castles, Red Knights and damsels in distress. Bridges co-stars as Jack, New York's #1 shock deejay, whose off-hand arrogance triggers a tragedy which ruins his career. Rated: R

programme.title: Morning Glory, (2009, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: An old-school anchorman who quit his longtime evening newscast because of its new, gossipy ways is recruited by a hotshot producer who's looking to revive a failing morning show.

programme.title: Passengers, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: While helping a handful of plane crash survivors cope with their grief, young psychologist Claire Summers (2008 Best Actress, Oscar nominee Anne Hathaway, Rachel Getting Married) begins to uncover conflicting accounts of the accident. rated -PG-13

programme.title: The Fisher King, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: Parry, a homeless history professor, lives in a fantasy world full of castles, Red Knights and damsels in distress. Bridges co-stars as Jack, New York's #1 shock deejay, whose off-hand arrogance triggers a tragedy which ruins his career. Rated: R

programme.title: All Styles, (2018, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.title: Vertical Limit, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: An emotionally-charged action-adventure tale of a retired climber (O'Donnell) who must launch a treacherous and extraordinary rescue effort up K2, the world's second-highest peak, to save his estranged sister and her summit team in a race against time.

programme.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape, (1993, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Taking care of Arnie is mostly Gilbert's task, which can be pretty demanding, at least while you are working at the local grocery store.

programme.title: Awakenings, (1990, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Robert De Niro and Robin Williams star in a story of the consequences of a maverick doctor's medical miracle. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Home for the Holidays, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: After losing her job, making out with her soon-to-be ex-boss, and finding out that her daughter plans to spend Thanksgiving with her boyfriend, Claudia Larson has to face spending the holiday with her family.

programme.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape, (1993, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Taking care of Arnie is mostly Gilbert's task, which can be pretty demanding, at least while you are working at the local grocery store.

programme.title: Home for the Holidays, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: After losing her job, making out with her soon-to-be ex-boss, and finding out that her daughter plans to spend Thanksgiving with her boyfriend, Claudia Larson has to face spending the holiday with her family.

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, History)
programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: John Grisham's The Rainmaker, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Matt Damon plays Rudy Baylor, a rookie lawyer in over his head on a high-profile case. Opposing him: an army of legal sharks. On Rudys side: Deck Shifflet, a feisty paralawyer who specializes in flunking the bar exam.

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Frank Pierce, a paramedic, is on the brink of madness from too many years of saving and losing lives. One fateful night, Frank meets Mary Burke, the daughter of a man Frank tried to save. Together, Frank and Mary confront the ghosts of the past.

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen is in prime form in this celebrated comedy and 1977 Best Picture Oscar-winner in which he portrays a highly neurotic comedy writer who falls head-over-heels in love with a naive small-town girl (Diane Keaton) who aspires to be a singer.

programme.title: Lenny, (1974, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman magnificently captures the complexities and contradictions of the legendary comedian Lenny Bruce's mercurial character.

programme.title: Love And Bullets, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: The FBI sends a loner (Charles Bronson) to kidnap a mobster's mistress in Switzerland.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Crime)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: The Killer Elite, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan and Robert Duvall star in Sam Peckinpah's tense, action-packed thriller that explores savagery and betrayal in the murky world of killers-for-hire.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Ta's body turns more and more into a giant popsicle, can she keep her brain from freezing to find a way to melt Big 2's strategy? Or will Big 2's penguin horde waddle all over her?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the judicial jerk Big 3 Johnson who takes the Deck Master form of Judge Man! How can Joey defeat a foe who can destroy Joey's monsters at will?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Just when Joey seems to gain the upper hand, he hits the longest streak of bad luck in the history of mankind! Has Joey's fortunes finally run out, or is a crooked judge ignoring the rules of the law?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 4 Nezbitt challenges Duke, Tristan, and Serenity for the right to gain control of three bodies at once! Will Serenity's errors cost her team the ultimate price when Tristan and Duke can't cover for her mistakes?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: One down, two to go! With the loss of Tristan, Serenity is heartbroken. Can she pull herself together and remember the lessons Tristan taught her to turn the duel around?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tristan's back... but he's not who he appears to be when he kidnaps Mokuba! It's time for Kaiba to stop monkeying around and rescue his brother, but he's confronted by Big 5 Leichter!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 5's Satellite Cannon attacks Kaiba's monsters from deep space! Mokuba's unwavering faith in Kaiba inspires him to believe that his brother will pull out the victory, but Noah has plans to ruin their brotherhood...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba arrives at Noah's sanctuary to rescue Mokuba, but Mokuba wants to stay with Noah! Has Mokuba seen the evil within Kaiba, or is something more sinister in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah gives the Big Five one last chance to redeem themselves in a five-on-two tag team duel where Yugi and Joey take on the entire Big Five!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five concentrate their attack on Joey so that Yugi would be forced to duel all alone! Outmanned and overpowered, Yugi and Joey are near the end of the line!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five summon an almighty dragon that previously defeated Joey, Mai, and Mokuba! Joey and Yugi pull out all the stops, but is that enough to avoid their minds being scattered over virtual reality?
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons three powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragons, but Yugi has no monsters remaining in his deck! Is losing only a matter of time, or will a long-dormant card from a fallen friend help turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba not only controls Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, but his Final Attack Orders card leaves Yugi with only three cards in his deck! If Yugi loses, he'll have to give up his chance to save the world from Marik's evil!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tired of Kaiba's insults, Joey challenges Kaiba for third place in the Battle City Tournament! Has Joey mastered enough strategies to take down the top dog, or is Kaiba going to wallop Joey like a pathetic puppy?

programme.title: Luffy and Boa arrive at Impel Down, but only thirty-three hours remain until Ace's execution. To save him, the Snake Princess must find a way to hide Luffy during her full-body search!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A DEADLY INFILTRATION! THE UNDERWATER PRISON IMPEL DOWN

programme.title: Time is running out on Ace, so Luffy teams up with a scoundrel who's going to pieces trying to escape Impel Down. There's no love lost between the former foes, but they'd better work together if they want to survive.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A REUNION IN HELL?! THE MAN WHO ATE THE CHOP-CHOP FRUIT!

programme.title: Luffy must part ways with a priceless treasure map before Buggy the Clown agrees to lead him through the bloody tangle of Blade Trees and Spike Needle Grass that make up Impel Down's Crimson Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BREAK THROUGH THE CRIMSON HELL! BUGGY'S CHAOS-INDUCING PLAN

programme.title: Luffy and Buggy the Clown could end up as hippo food if they aren't careful in Impel Down's Wild Beast Hell. Of course, the rubber-man might find that a better fate than dealing with the prison's putrid warden!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRONGEST MAN IN THE PRISON! POISON MAN MAGELLAN APPEARS

programme.title: Luffy and his crew stumble upon a most peculiar village when they hitch a ride on a fire-breathing beetle. The natives are petrified of pirates, but they welcome the Straw Hats with open arms!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / A GOLD LION'S AMBITION ON THE MOVE

programme.title: The citizens of Little East Blue throw in a feast in honor of the Straw Hats, but when the Amigo Pirates try to capture Boss the Beetle, Luffy and his crew will have to defend their new friends.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / LITTLE EAST BLUE IN DANGER

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji prepare to do battle on behalf of Boss the Beetle, but Captain Largo of the Amigo Pirates counters with a deadly arsenal of nets to put the Straw Hat brawlers on lock down!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / THE FIERCE ONSLAUGHT OF THE AMIGO PIRATES

programme.title: Luffy kicks into Second Gear for his rematch with Largo, and Nami leads the islanders as they lay waste to the Amigo Pirates. Boss the Beetle may be safe for now, but someone sinister lurks behind the scenes.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Special Presentation Related to the Movie/ The Battle is on! Luffy Vs. Largo

programme.title: Luffy struggles to stay a step ahead of a prison patrol made up of hungry lions and poisonous scorpions! Meanwhile, Ace spends what could be his final hours swapping stories with a pirate who hates pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Warlord in Prison Jimbei, The Honorable Pirate

programme.title: While the guards struggle to squelch a violent prison uprising, Luffy and his fellow fugitives try to keep their cool in a level of Impel Down known as Starvation Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Trap of Chief Guard Saldeath - Level 3 Starvation Hell

programme.title: Boa Hancock uses her ample assets to buy some private time for a clandestine chat with Ace. Meanwhile, Luffy needs help from a graceful friend to escape the jaws of a hungry Sphinx!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Liberated Swan! Reunion! Bon Kurei

programme.title: Luffy and Bon are on the verge of reaching Level 4, but they didn't count on fighting a demonic, lightning-fast, devastatingly powerful Minotaur! To defeat this beast, they'll need help from a human candle and a deranged clown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chief Warden Magellan Moves - The Net to Trap Straw Hat Is Complete!

programme.title: Luffy narrowly avoids a deadly dip in the boiling pool of blood, only to find himself face to face with Warden Magellan. Meanwhile, outside the prison walls, the marine fleet prepares for Whitebeard's onslaught!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Preparations for War! A Decisive Battle in Level 4 - Blazing Hell

programme.title: Warden Magellan is a monster of a man with a penchant for poisoning prisoners. To rescue Ace, Luffy must go toe to toe with this toxic terror, but how do you defeat a foe who's deadly to the touch?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Magellan's Strength! Bon Kurei Flees Before His Enemy

programme.title: Luffy's daring assault on the venomous warden of Impel Down leaves him struggling to stand up, but despite the lethal poison breaking down his body, the rubber-man kicks his rescue mission into Second Gear!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SHOWDOWN HAS COME! LUFFY'S DESPERATE LAST ATTACK!

programme.title: While Luffy hovers perilously on the verge of death, Bon Clay embarks on a suicidal rescue mission plagued by sub-zero temperatures and bloodthirsty wolves with a supremely savage disposition!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FOR HIS FRIEND! BON CLAY'S DEADLY RESCUE ATTEMPT

programme.title: No existing antidote can save Luffy from the poison coursing through his veins, yet Bon Clay refuses to give up. His final, fleeting hope is a mysterious miracle-worker rumored to have vanished into the Gates of Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A PARADISE IN HELL / IMPEL DOWN LEVEL 5.5

programme.title: Bon is overjoyed to hear that Luffy is still alive, but his happiness quickly turns to shock when he learns that Ivan's agonizingly painful "Healing Hormones" will cost the rubber-man ten years of his life!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S TREATMENT BEGINS / IVA'S MIRACULOUS POWER!

programme.title: Ace is scheduled to be executed in a matter of hours, and Luffy's still hovering on the verge of death. It will take a miracle to save them both, but Bon would rather die than give up on his friend!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BELIEVE IN MIRACLES! BON CLAY'S CRIES FROM THE HEART

programme.title: Luffy miraculously survived his brush with death, but he's far too weak to finish rescuing Ace. Ivan is reluctant to lend a hormonal hand to the doomed rescue mission until he learns of Luffy's lineage!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY BACK IN ACTION! IVA BEGINS THE BREAKOUT PLAN!!

programme.title: The quest to rescue Ace tuckers out thanks to a blast of sleeping gas! Ivan's scissor-handed sidekick puts an end to nap time, but Luffy will have to join forces with a scar-faced foe from the past if he wants to complete his mission!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ACE'S CONVOY BEGINS / BATTLE ON THE LOWEST FLOOR, LEVEL 6!

programme.title: Luffy's desperate attempt to rescue Ace is bolstered by two powerful new allies: the murderous Crocodile and the honorable fishman Jinbei. Meanwhile, Ivan sparks a prison riot to create a diversion for the rubber-man.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE ULTIMATE TEAM IS FORMED / SHAKING IMPEL DOWN!

programme.title: Luffy and his gang of outlaws cause a commotion on Level Four, Blackbeard's arrival leads to the release of the prison's most feared inmate, and Ace gazes upon the great blue sky for what could be the very last time!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EVEN MORE CHAOS! BLACKBEARD TEACH INVADES

programme.title: Ivan undergoes a curvaceous transformation to better battle sadistic Sadie, the commander of the Demon Guards. Meanwhile, Blackbeard and Shiryu head for a showdown on Level 1!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE DANGEROUS ENCOUNTER! BLACKBEARD AND SHIRYU OF THE RAIN!

programme.title: Luffy's bone-crushing battle with the Vice Warden of Impel Down is interrupted by the sudden appearance of Blackbeard. When the rubber-man hears what the warlord has to say heads will roll!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: REFUSAL TO BE DEFEATED! SERIOUS HANNYABAL

programme.title: Even in Second Gear, Luffy is no match for Blackbeard's vortex, but the rubber-man rebounds by knocking out a Demon Guard with one ferocious pistol-punch. Elsewhere, Warden Magellan vows to finish Luffy once and for all!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: JET PISTOL OF ANGER! LUFFY VS. BLACKBEARD!

programme.title: Ace is to be executed in a matter of hours, and Magellan's toxic breath is singeing the back of Luffy's neck. Ivan uses a devastating Death Wink to buy some time, but the warden's Poison Hydra may be more than he can handle!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: STOP MAGELLAN! IVA'S ESOTERIC TECHNIQUE EXPLODES!

programme.title: Luffy dons a suit of waxy armor in preparation for his rematch with Warden Magellan. Outside the prison walls, Jimbei turns a door into a boat, so Crocodile and Buggy can commandeer an escape vessel!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MAGELLAN'S TRICKY MOVE! A FOILED ESCAPE PLAN!

programme.title: Magellan takes his toxic attack to the next level by unleashing the hideous and deadly Venom Demon! If Jimbei and Crocodile don't return with a rescue ship soon, Luffy won't survive long enough to save Ace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE ESCAPEE TEAM IN TROUBLE! THE FORBIDDEN MOVE: VENOM DEMON!

programme.title: Luffy and his merry band of escapees are safely onboard the rescue ship, but they're not out of hot water just yet. A fleet of marines is bombarding them with cannon balls, and an impenetrable gate looms on the horizon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: COME, FINAL MIRACLE! BREAK THROUGH THE GATE OF JUSTICE!

programme.title: Luffy and Ivan mourn the loss of Bon Clay, and Captain Buggy's reputation gets a boost when a phone call from the Marines reveals the secrets of his past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO THE NAVY HEADQUARTERS! OFF TO RESCUE ACE!

programme.title: While Luffy continues his rescue mission, Nami learns a lesson about how to turn rain into cash, and Franky wakes up in a freezing forest full of ferocious cyborg animals!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! THE WEATHERIA REPORT AND THE CYBORG ANIMALS!

programme.title: Sanji tries to fight his way off a most peculiar island, but his frilly battle costume threatens to awaken his inner maiden. Elsewhere, Chopper tries to avoid being served in a hot pot!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! THE CHICK OF A GIANT BIRD AND A PINK SHOWDOWN!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds out about the jewel "Poison Trio" of the Borges family and decides to steal it after Fujiko goads him. Galdan, the nephew of Lucricia greets Lupin, and tells him that elderly Lucricia had been arrested and must be broken out of jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes on a safe-cracking rampage and rakes in 10 million francs. He needs the money to purchase the world's only rare Gold Butterfly at an auction. But Lupin drops the 10 million francs while on the run

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin scopes a jewelry museum where the billion-dollar gem Cleopatra's Tear is displayed. But Lupin can't get to it because the display case is secured by high-voltage electricity.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: No thief has ever succeeded in stealing the secret gem of Pompeii's nunnery; it's guarded by venomous snakes. Even Arsene Lupin gave up on it, since he hates snakes. But Lupin takes on the challenge. Will Lupin succeed? And what kind of secret gem is it?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though the tycoon Steel had replaced all his bodily organs with artificial organs to live, he's told that he only has a week to live. There is only one way he could prolong his life, which is to receive a brain transplant and he wants Lupin's Brain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Famous gourmand and field mice scientist Salmon Whitney is also known as being the chairman of a Canadian diamond mining operation. Lupin is after his diamonds, which will go on auction in Paris.
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Runs and the Pig Rolls

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Coaxed by Fujiko, Lupin decides to steal the diamond chandelier at the Kremlin Palace. He disguises himself as Zenigata and infiltrates the palace, but government police soldier Natasha captures him and throws him in the slammer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: England's Lord Weather provokes Lupin with a bet, and dares him to steal Red Arrow away from him. Lupin takes the challenge as it's a matter of pride, but Jigen wants no part of it because he and Weather are gambling buddies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Miami Bank is on the verge of bankruptcy after its last customers closed their accounts. The bank manager Garlic devises a plan to revive the bank, and drums up news that his bank had been raided by Lupin; he also asks Lupin to really do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Thief brothers Nanja-Monja have been in the business since the days of Arsne Lupin; they decide to induct Lupin as a tourist attraction for the Republic of Karchina. But first they abduct Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: Hair Breadth Rescue Operation for Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko joins Lupin and gang who are camping and cooking Sukiyaki; people are hunting Fujiko, and gunfire is exchanged. Fujiko gets captured and Lupin's Sukiyaki meal gets ruined, but he finds an atomic bomb's detonator plug inside of the Sukiyaki bowl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Genius prodigy boy Romanoff has ten doctorates from Russia's Public Academy; blustering that no greater than he exists, he challenges Lupin. Since Fujiko is involved, Lupin cannot back down; what will become of this challenge?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko is the model for Norway's famous sculptor Vingel's crystal mermaid statue; she believed when he said he would give it to her the day it was finished, but Vingel gets greedy and sells it to the mayor of the city of Bergen instead.
programme.sub-title: The Mermaid That Disappears in the Midnight Sun

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin tries to steal a bunch of diamonds from a diamond auction. But the auction auditorium is at the Marine Tower above a skyscraper, and there is only one transparent elevator to get there.
programme.sub-title: The Target is Five Hundred and Fifty Five Meters Away

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin heads to Mecca to steal Mohammed's treasure. But first he is confronted by Patra Lawrence, the grandaughter of the Lawrence of Arabia, who is the chief of Mecca's special police headquarters; how will Lupin steal the treasure now?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Fujiko instigates Lupin and friends to go steal; this time their target is the Jovich Piano installed in a music hall built around it. There is no door large enough in the hall to carry the piano out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the shipment of raw diamonds that arrived at a harbor in Nice; he sneaks into the storage in the middle of the night but Zenigata was on to him. Lupin escapes with the help of Jigen and Goemon, but Fujiko gets captured.
programme.sub-title: To Arrest Lupin, the Mission at Highway

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A month ago, president Gappolini of one of the world's top five trading companies, had died. Gappolini bequeathed a will saying that the heir to the company presidency will be the world's finest sharpshooter and Jigen is a target.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's said that immense sums of money confiscated from organized crime get transported to a Swiss bank by ICPO, once a year. Naturally, Lupin wants a piece of that action, so he steals the armed security vehicle along with Zenigata in it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The city of Grand Hexagon lies at the border of France and Spain; the city is designed with six sides. But at the center of the city is Raika Bank storing fifty tons of gold bullion; an alarm will go off if even one bullion is missing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Robot soldier Lamda flies above the sky of Tokyo, raids a jewelry store. Its creator, professor Oyamada's daughter Maki and Lupin say that it was just a show to demonstrate the inhumanity of robots.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd: Voyage to Danger
programme.desc: Someone sent orders to assassinate Lupin. Will he survive or die trying!?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #6 Dragon of Doom
programme.desc: On the bottom of the ocean, within the sunken Titanic, the golden dragon statue waits. When Lupin and the gang are hired to retrieve it, Goemon recognizes the dragon as one of his clan's treasures. Now, he's ready to fight his own friends to protect it!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #7 The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
programme.desc: To retrieve the Harimao's Treasure, Lupin and the gang must gather three lost statues. Lupin reluctantly partners with the aging "double-O" MI-6 agent Sir Archer and his granddaughter Diana to gather the statues.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #8 The Secret of Twilight Gemini
programme.desc: As Lupin's mentor Don Dolune lies on his deathbed, he hands the master thief a gift: the diamond named Twilight. But it's only half of the treasure-the other half of the Twilight can be found in Morocco

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiance, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: The Crow: City of Angels, (1996, Science fiction)
programme.desc: This fast-moving, action-packed sequel to THE CROW follows the rise of murder victim Ashe Corven, brought back to life by a mysterious crow. With the help of a woman named Sarah, he exacts revenge on his killers one by one.

programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: An epic set against the breathtaking landscapes of ancient China, Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon combines the exhilarating martial arts choreography by Yuen Wo-Ping with the sensitivity and classical storytelling of an Ang Lee film.

programme.title: World War Z, (2013, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: 30 Days of Night, (2007, Vampires)
programme.desc: Josh Hartnett (The Black Dahlia, Pearl Harbor) crosses over to the dark side in this bone-chilling adaptation of the cult-hit graphic novel, brought to the screen in all its demonic glory.

programme.title: 30 Days of Night: Dark Days, (2010, Zombies)
programme.desc: Almost a year has passed since Barrow, Alaskas population was decimated by vampires. Stella, mourning her husbands murder, has been travelling the world trying to convince others that vampires exist.

programme.title: World War Z, (2013, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow, (1999, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Ichabod Crane, an investigator determined to stop the murderous Headless Horseman.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: Robin Hood of the Pecos, (1941, Western)
programme.desc: It took some time after the Civil War for the South to recover. Towns imposed martial law to maintain order and the "good guys" banded together against the criminals.

programme.title: Zorro, (1975, Drama)
programme.desc: In the New World, a new Spanish governor finds the province of Nueva Aragn under the iron fist of the corrupt Colonel Huerta and vows to bring justice under the guise of a masked avenger.

programme.title: Sabata, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: Adios, Sabata, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Under the brutal rule of garrison leader Col. Skimmel, a group of Mexican revolutionaries hire gunslinger Sabata (Yul Brynner) to rob a transport of gold in order to buy weapons. But the Colonel has other plans...taking the gold for himself.

programme.title: Return of Sabata, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: The great Lee Van Cleef ('Death Rides a Horse') returns as the famous freewheeling gunslinger Sabata. In this third and final go-round for the enigmatic sharpshooter, Sabata seeks revenge when a band of desperadoes bilks him out of $5,000.

programme.title: The Iron Sheriff, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: Sterling Hayden plays a sheriff with continuing moral dilemmas. Should he relate a deathbed confession which falsely implicates his son in a murder? Should he carry out his threat to cold-bloodedly kill the real murderer or bring him to legal justice?

programme.title: Five Guns To Tombstone, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw is living a clean life until his no-good brother who just escaped from prison ropes him into pulling a robbery. Now Billy has his own plan...to prevent it. And all he needs is his six shooters and a little luck.

programme.title: The Halliday Brand, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: A western about a young man's (Joseph Cotten) disillusionment with his father (Ward Bond), a corrupt sheriff. When his dad turns away from the lynching of his sister's lover, the boy rebels and his father declares him an 'outlaw.'

programme.title: Hondo, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Hondo Lane, a cavalry rider who becomes the protector of Angie Lowe as well as a father figure to her boy, Johnny. Angie, determinedly awaiting the return of her husband, refuses to leave their homestead despite the growing danger.

programme.title: Only Lovers Left Alive, (2013, Vampires)
programme.desc: Driven by sensual photography, trance-like music, and droll humor, Jim Jarmuschs ONLY LOVERS LEFT ALIVE is a meditation on art, science, and the mysteries of everlasting love.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin', (2005, Musical)
programme.desc: Following a near-fatal gun battle, Marcus recalls his journey from orphaned street kid from the Bronx to making his mark in the drug trade to teaming up with a fellow ex-con (Terrence Howard) for his shot at becoming a successful rap artist.

programme.title: Changing Lanes, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: Late for court, an attorney weaves in and out of traffic. In a different lane, a father whose right to see his children rests on getting to court on time. A minor accident will turn these two strangers into beasts.

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile, (2003, Romance)
programme.desc: Julia Roberts stars as a novice art history professor with a surprising lesson plan that inspires her students to open their eyes to love and life.

programme.desc: Shingos friend Mika gives him a doll but Shingo unintentionally breaks the doll and hurts Mikas feelings. Shingo decides to apologize.

programme.desc: The girls search for a vacation spot so they can focus on training. Instead, they settle on a mansion that has a very eerie service staff.

programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians grow in strength with its newest member Sailor Jupiter joining the team. Sailor Moon is appointed as team leader.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vtima de suas armadilhas o inspetor de polcia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que so brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: Assassino Americano
programme.desc: O gngster americano Erik Vasquez est planejando se tornar o principal chefe do submundo mexicano, apenas para se ver fazendo inimigos tanto dos poderosos cartis quanto de seus prprios aliados.

programme.title: Os garotos so vtimas de uma brincadeira de Primeiro de Abril e as coisas no acabam bem. Butters fica mal, Cartman est furioso e o resto dos meninos est com medo que acontea de novo.
programme.desc: South Park - S13E4

programme.desc: South Park - S13E5

programme.title: Chegou a hora da corrida de pinhos em South Park e Stan e Randy esto trabalhando duro para construir o melhor carro. Enquanto trabalha no carro de corrida, Randy adquire um componente muito especial para garantir o primeiro lugar de Stan.

programme.title: Viajando de barco pelo Atlntico, os Bladebreakers devem no apenas lidar com o enjoo de Kenny, mas uma revelao devastadora.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E30

programme.title: As crianas so levadas a perder o barco, forando-as a passar a noite em Londres, onde uma misteriosa fita de vdeo do pai de Tyson entregue a eles.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E31

programme.title: Depois que seu trem misteriosamente sequestrado, as crianas se encontram nos recessos escuros de um tnel. aqui que os Bladebreakers encontram um grupo de fantasmas zumbis, os Dark Bladers.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E32

programme.title: Enquanto os Bladebreakers vo para o Campeonato do Mundo na Rssia, eles ficam presos em Paris, onde acabam perdendo um dia procurando Kai que desapareceu misteriosamente.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E33

programme.title: Os Bladebreakers passam um dia extra em Paris e se separam para ver os pontos tursticos. Ray alcana seu tio, Max faz uma farra de compras e Kai procura informaes.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E34

programme.title: Os Bladebreakers chegam a Roma, procurando pelo misterioso Enrique. Zombando do desafio de Beyblade, Enrique decide que prefere passar o dia com algumas de suas amigas.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E35

programme.title: No querendo deixar sua derrota inicial para Enrique o perturbar, Tyson fica ocupado refazendo seu Beyblade. Com Enrique duvidando de sua prpria tcnica, e Oliver visitando-o da Frana em Roma, o cenrio est pronto para uma revanche.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E36

programme.title: Enrique e Oliver decidem levar nossos heris em um passeio dirigvel para visitar o castelo de Robert. O motivo - Tyson espera vingar uma perda anterior para Robert que aconteceu a bordo do navio que chegou Europa.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E37

programme.title: Os Bladebreakers se sentiram em casa na manso de Robert, recusando-se a sair, a menos que os europeus concordassem em um Beybattle final. Para ensinar uma lio a seus convidados, Robert concorda em uma partida em seu novo estdio.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E38

programme.title: A segunda partida comea no Olympia Coliseum e, com os dois lutadores recebendo ajuda no solicitada de seus respectivos companheiros de equipe, Kai consegue derrotar Johnny.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E39

programme.title: Os Bladebreakers chegam a Moscou em antecipao ao torneio final do World Beyblading. Enquanto procuram seu hotel na cidade fria, eles encontram Boris, um homem estranho que afirma ser o chefe de um centro de treinamento de Beyblading.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E40

programme.title: Os Bladebreakers encontram alguns velhos amigos na Rssia quando All Starz e o White Tiger Clan aparecem para uma partida de exibio.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E41

programme.title: Kai est dividido entre escapar da Abadia, agora conhecida como Biovolt Corporation (sigla para Beybladers com inteno de vitria sobre a tirania sem lei), ou explor-la ainda mais na tentativa de desvendar memrias esquecidas de sua infncia.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E42

programme.title: o primeiro dia do Beyblade World Championships em Moscou e, quando os Bladebreakers deixam o hotel, eles ainda no conseguiram localizar Kai que est desaparecido h algum tempo.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E43

programme.title: Inuyasha e Koga chegam ao local da luta de Moryomaru e Naraku. Mas Moryomaru, que quer seus cacos de Shikon, pega Koga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E6

programme.title: Kikyo foi contaminado pela teia de aranha de Naraku. Para salv-la, Inuyasha e Kagome precisam da corda do arco no mausolu do Monte Azusa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E7

programme.title: Kikyo tenta purificar Naraku e seus fragmentos de Shikon. Ela tambm tenta purificar a vontade de Midoriko que controla os cacos nas pernas de Koga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E8

programme.title: Sesshoumaru pergunta a sua me como ele pode expandir o Meido de Tenseiga, o caminho para o submundo. Em resposta, sua me usa a pedra Meido que o pai de Sesshoumaru lhe deu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E9

programme.title: O Prncipe das Flores um demnio que se alimenta de coraes tristes ou angustiados. Deslumbrado pela fragrncia da flor, Inuyasha est envolvido em um sonho falso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E10

programme.title: O Espelho Demonaco rouba a energia demonaca de Tetsusaiga. Inuyasha contra-ataca, apesar de sofrer alguns golpes ferozes, mas todos os seus ataques apontados para o Espelho Demonaco acabam sendo tomados por Kanna.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E11

programme.title: A fim de derrotar os demnios, Sango reveste Hiraikotsu com veneno. Para purific-lo do veneno, o Mestre das Poes diz que ela deve derrotar o demnio dentro do jarro.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E12

programme.title: Shishinki, o Ogre da Morte, aparece diante de Sesshomaru, dizendo a ele que Inuyasha e o pai de Sesshoumaru roubaram seu Meido Zangetsuha em uma batalha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E13

programme.title: Sesshoumaru fica furioso quando descobre o segredo por trs do Tenseiga. Totosai tenta convencer Sesshoumaru de que ele ir superar seu pai uma vez que ele seja capaz de abandonar seu apego espada, bem como seu dio a Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E14

programme.title: Sesshomaru rouba o poder de Tetsusaiga com Tenseiga, fortalecido pela lembrana de Kanna, um fragmento do Mirror Demon. Inuyasha se transforma em sua forma demonaca e tenta atacar, mas Sesshoumaru dispara seu Meido Zangetsuha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E15

programme.title: A sacerdotisa Hitomiko perdeu a vida nas mos de Naraku. Mas ela volta vida e tranca Kagome dentro de uma barreira. Ento, o verdadeiro poder espiritual do arco do Monte Azusa se revela!
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E16

programme.title: Inuyasha e Kaede tentam descobrir o que est bloqueando os poderes de Kagome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E17

programme.title: Kohaku permanece inconsciente depois de ser encarado por Magatsuhi, a vontade do mal. Kagome est preocupada, mas ela tem que se curvar e estudar para os exames de admisso, ento ela decide voltar para casa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E18

programme.title: Sesshoumaru persegue a m vontade, Magatsuhi. Mas apenas parte de uma armadilha criada por Byakuya dos Sonhos. Magatsuhi encontra Kohaku inconsciente, e ele tenta entregar seu fragmento de Shikon para Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E19

programme.title: Naraku est atrs do ltimo fragmento de Shikon e ele toma Kagome como refm.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E20

programme.title: Kagome se forma no ensino mdio e retorna era feudal. Shippo e Kohaku ficam na aldeia de Kaede, enquanto o resto da gangue se dirige para a batalha de Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E21

programme.title: O corao de Inuyasha devorado pelo veneno da Jia de Shikon, e ele se transforma em sua forma demonaca. Ele machuca Kagome e a escurido em seu corao toma conta dele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E22

programme.title: Os poderes espirituais de Kagome so restaurados e a luz divina revivida na Jia Shikon de Naraku. No entanto, Naraku usa isso como um chamariz para atrair Sango em sua armadilha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E23

programme.title: Naraku tem vivido como um demnio apesar de ter um corao humano. Enquanto lutava contra ele, Kagome pergunta sobre seu verdadeiro desejo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E24

programme.title: Naraku se dirige para o Poo do Comedor de Ossos e desaparece! Antes de desaparecer, Naraku faz seu ltimo desejo para Kagome, ferido pelas mos de Byakuya, ser engolido em Meido, o caminho para o submundo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E25

programme.title: Quando a ltima pessoa a obter a Jia Shikon faz o nico desejo correto, a jia ser purificada e desaparecer inteiramente deste mundo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E26

programme.title: Com uma ajudinha de seus novos amigos, os Chapus de Palha dizem adeus a Skypiea e seguem novamente para o Mar Azul.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E60

programme.title: A Marinha est convencida de que o Merry um navio fantasma depois que a embarcao dos Chapus de Palha cai no forte vinda dos cus. Seus tripulantes, porm, desaparecem.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E61

programme.title: Disfarado, Sanji mostra aos chefs da Marinha, liderados por Jessica, como que se cozinha uma refeio decente para os soldados famintos.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E62

programme.title: Zoro acaba prisioneiro na fortaleza, e Chopper e Nami auxiliam uma nervosa mdica que trata dos soldados feridos em combate.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E63

programme.title: Robin e Usopp se disfaram do mesmo inspetor externo da Marinha, e Luffy e Sanji so descobertos por Jonathan.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E64

programme.title: O verdadeiro Shepherd jogado na cela de Zoro e Usopp, e Luffy e Sanji correm para resgatar seus companheiros antes que sejam tambm capturados.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E65

programme.title: Luffy e Sanji, aps libertarem Zoro e Usopp, tentam fugir de Navarone. A unidade de elite da Marinha acionada, e Nami e Chopper chegam s docas.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E66

programme.title: O bando se encontra nas docas e acaba cercado pela Marinha. Usando Nami como falsa refm, eles conseguem fazer os inimigos os deixarem subir a bordo do Merry novamente.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E67

programme.title: O bando disfara o Merry de navio da Marinha para que consigam recuperar seu tesouro. Com o ouro, eles decidem que vo contratar um construtor naval.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E68

programme.title: Usopp separa o bando em dois: a equipe de recuperao do ouro e a de recuperao do waver. Shepherd decide capturar Luffy por conta prpria.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E69

programme.title: Zoro, Usopp, Sanji e Robin continuam a busca pelo tesouro, e Luffy leva Nami aos aposentos do capito para recuperar o ouro.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E70

programme.title: O Merry acaba encalhado na mar baixa e Jonathan acredita ter conseguido seu xeque-mate. O Discador de Impacto impulsiona o navio, e os Discadores de Sopro e de Chamas inflam o balo polvo novamente, para a fuga.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E71

programme.title: Luffy e seus companheiros sobrevivem a um encontro quase mortal com monstros martimos, mas acabam em uma misteriosa ilha onde tudo muito mais comprido do que deveria ser!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E1

programme.title: Luffy acaba envolvido em uma Davy Back Fight com os Piratas de Foxy. O Chapu de Palha nunca foge de um desafio, mas nesta disputa pode perder seus companheiros!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E2

programme.title: A Davy Back comea com uma Donut Race ao redor de Long Ring Long Land! O bando enfrenta Foxy para decidir quem perder um membro da tripulao!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E3

programme.title: Nami usa suas habilidades de navegao para colocar o bando beira da vitria, mas Foxy tem mais do que alguns meros truques sujos na manga!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E4

programme.title: Graas a uma trapaa de Foxy, Chopper acaba perdido para o inimigo. A nica esperana de recuper-lo jaz em Zoro e Sanji, mas eles precisaro aprender a trabalhar juntos para salvar a pobre rena!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E5

programme.title: Sanji e Zoro apanham, mas no desistem. Com uma pitada de sorte - e um pouco de trabalho em equipe - eles saem vitoriosos do segundo round da Davy Back Fight!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E6

programme.title: O Round 3 da Davy Back Fight uma corrida num circuito oval! O destino de Chopper est por um triz, e o bando tem um problema: Luffy no sabe andar de patins!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E7

programme.title: Nas voltas finais da ltima disputa da Davy Back Fight, Luffy e os Chapus de Palha precisam vencer para recuperar Chopper dos Piratas Foxy!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E8

programme.title: Na segunda Davy Back Fight, a primeira partida um jogo de queimada entre os Chapus de Palha de Luffy e os Piratas Foxy!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E9

programme.title: Na sequncia da segunda Davy Back Fight, Nami, Usopp, Chopper, Sanji e Zoro precisam disputar o Dodge Touch Daruma, uma brincadeira de Sinal Verde, Sinal Vermelho entre piratas!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E10
